subNodes.name: function()publicpayable{if(msg.data.length>0){addressmodule=enabled[msg.sig];if(module==address(0)){emitReceived(msg.value,msg.sender,msg.data);}else{require(authorised[module],"BW: must be an authorised module for static call");assembly{calldatacopy(0,0,calldatasize())letresult:=staticcall(gas,module,0,calldatasize(),0,0)returndatacopy(0,0,returndatasize())switchresultcase0{revert(0,returndatasize())}default{return(0,returndatasize())}}}}}
